title: El Panama
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Panamanian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Large open-air restaurant at the Eco Venao lodge, a short walk from the Pacific beachfront and is surrounded by tall trees and flowering plants. Specializes in Panamánian fusion cuisine with several choices for vegetarians: black bean burger, pasta, hummus, salads, rice and beans, vegetable soup. Beverages are wine, beer, fruit shakes, soft drinks, coffee, tea, and spring water.
